title: VIDEO: Top 5 Chain RE-WAXING Questions with Silca
content:
Josh from Silca dives into the most common chain RE-WAXING questions that have been circulating recently. Whether you’re preparing for a race day or simply maintaining your bike, this FAQ session covers everything from the best re-waxing techniques to handling those long/muddy race scenarios…

The post VIDEO: Top 5 Chain RE-WAXING Questions with Silca appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
